channel.title: Forum.imperium42 >> is now forum.throneoflies.com
channel.description:
For a number of reasons, but mostly to split i42 stuff from tol stuff (publishers like it), we have moved from forum.imperium42.com to forum.throneoflies.com ~
* Update bookmarks: Links with cached bookmarks do weird things. * Links should now work again as long as they're from forum.throneoflies.com * oAuth2 ("login with {something}") works again EXCEPT for FB, for now: FB didn't like we changed hosts so fast, so awaiting an unblock. I suggest an alt for the time being since they said COVID slowed down approval process and it is now weekend.

item.title: Forum.imperium42 >> is now forum.throneoflies.com
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
For a number of reasons, but mostly to split i42 stuff from tol stuff (publishers like it), we have moved from forum.imperium42.com to forum.throneoflies.com ~

  • Update bookmarks: Links with cached bookmarks do weird things.
  • Links should now work again as long as they’re from forum.throneoflies.com
  • oAuth2 (“login with {something}”) works again EXCEPT for FB, for now: FB didn’t like we changed hosts so fast, so awaiting an unblock. I suggest an alt for the time being since they said COVID slowed down approval process and it is now weekend.
